markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elude Trouble](/Feats.aspx?ID=5565) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 11 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
A creature missed you with a melee attack.

</column>

---

Stride up to your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions from the creature that missed you.
name: Elude Trouble
